The limits of dark Transmetal technology are stretched, but SS 
manages to stay in flight as he screams.  He send another blast of 
fire at Epyon.  His Transmetal armor is charred and damaged around 
his chest and stomach.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He yells again, as the theeth go through his arm.
> "Damn you!"
> The green globe on Epyon's chest starts to glow. 
> "Eat this scum!"
> A huge energy blast erupts from the orb. The force carries Epyon 
back,
> away from his opponent. The huge blast should be hitting SS, from 
point
> blank range.
